rpg_opening.name: Act 2: Trash Odyssey - Opening
rpg_opening.description: Your journey begins here, in the darkness.
cutsceneText: â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ACT 2: TRASH ODYSSEY
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
You've found meaning. You've collected ingredients.
You've lingered in silence and found peace.
The person lifts you to their mouth...
"Ugh, too much avocado."
THUNK.
You tumble through darkness. Land in wetness.
Coffee grounds. Banana peels. The stench of decay.
The garbage can.
For a moment, you despair.
But then you remember: You have PURPOSE now.
You're not just a bun. You're a COMPLETE bun.
And complete buns don't give up.
Somewhere beyond this trash, beyond the backyard,
there's a shed. And in that shed, a lunchbox.
A place where forgotten foods rest in peace.
You will reach it.
No matter how many monsters stand in your way.

garbage_can_start.name: Garbage Can
garbage_can_start.description: The smell of decay surrounds you. Coffee grounds, banana peels, and forgotten food create a treacherous landscape. You've landed in the trash, but this is just the beginning.
garbage_can_start.firstVisit: You stand at the bottom of the garbage can. Wet, sticky, but alive. The walls rise high above you. This is where your odyssey truly begins.

coffee_grounds_cavern.name: Coffee Grounds Cavern
coffee_grounds_cavern.description: Dark, damp tunnels carved through compressed coffee grounds. The bitter smell is overwhelming. Movement in the shadows catches your eye.
coffee_grounds_cavern.firstVisit: You push through clumps of wet coffee grounds. This is your first real test. Something oozes toward you...

napkin_plains.name: Napkin Plains
napkin_plains.description: Wide open spaces covered in crumpled napkins. Safer than most routes, but more enemies patrol here.
napkin_plains.firstVisit: Napkins flutter in an unseen breeze. The safer path... but 'safe' is relative in the trash.

banana_peel_bridge.name: Banana Peel Bridge
banana_peel_bridge.description: A treacherous bridge made of slippery banana peels. One wrong step could be fatal. Stronger enemies lurk here.
banana_peel_bridge.firstVisit: The bridge stretches before you, slick and yellow. This is the hard way. Are you ready?

choices.label: â†’ Cross to Yogurt Container Ruins
â† Retreat to Coffee Grounds Cavern

yogurt_container_ruins.name: Yogurt Container Ruins
yogurt_container_ruins.description: The remains of a yogurt container, now a fortress of hardened dairy. Something foul waits inside.
yogurt_container_ruins.firstVisit: You've reached the ruins. The smell hits you first. Sour. Rotten. Deadly. The mini-boss awaits.

boss_spoiled_milk.name: Yogurt Container Ruins - Boss Arena
boss_spoiled_milk.description: The curdled nightmare emerges. Spoiled Milk. Your first true test.

trash_bag_depths.name: Trash Bag Depths
trash_bag_depths.description: A massive black trash bag. Inside, a pocket of relative safety. And... a merchant?
trash_bag_depths.firstVisit: You tear through the plastic and find an unlikely sanctuary. A cockroach in a tiny hat waves at you. 'Welcome, welcome! You looking good for bun!'

cockroach_shop.name: Cockroach Merchant's Shop
cockroach_shop.description: The merchant spreads out a collection of salvaged goods on a bottle cap. His inventory is surprisingly impressive.

backyard_battlefield.name: Backyard Battlefield
backyard_battlefield.description: You've emerged into the open air. Grass towers like trees. The sky is vast. And hungry animals patrol.
backyard_battlefield.firstVisit: Sunlight! You've reached the backyard. But celebration is premature. Predators hunt here.

garden_gauntlet.name: Garden Gauntlet
garden_gauntlet.description: The garden. The final natural barrier before the shed. And the domain of the Raccoon King.
garden_gauntlet.firstVisit: A small figure sits on a throne of trash. A bottle cap crown gleams. The Raccoon King has been expecting you.

choices.label: â†’ Challenge the Raccoon King (BOSS FIGHT)

boss_raccoon_king.name: Garden Gauntlet - Throne of Trash
boss_raccoon_king.description: The Raccoon King rises. His minions emerge. This will not be easy.

shed_entrance.name: Shed Entrance
shed_entrance.description: The shed looms before you. Inside, the lunchbox awaits. Your journey's end is near.
shed_entrance.firstVisit: You've made it. The shed. Just a little further. But the final stretch is never easy.

specialEncounter.description: A shadow blocks the doorway. Massive. Golden. The Hungry Dog. The secret final boss.

boss_hungry_dog.name: Shed Entrance - The Ultimate Challenge
boss_hungry_dog.description: The dog growls. To it, you're a snack. To you, it's the apocalypse. The secret boss.

lunchbox_sanctuary.name: Lunchbox Sanctuary
lunchbox_sanctuary.description: You crawl over the lip of the lunchbox. Inside: peace. Safety. Home. You made it.
endingText: You crawl over the lip of the lunchbox.
Inside: A bruised apple. Stale crackers. A juice box,
long since drained. The faint smell of peanut butter.
You nestle between the crackers. They don't judge.
Through slime and grease and raccoons and fear,
You are a bun who CHOSE to live.

secret_ending.name: Lunchbox Sanctuary - Legendary Victory
secret_ending.description: You defeated the impossible. The dog. The legend. You are the Legendary Bun.
endingText: A bun who conquered the kitchen.
A bun who survived the trash.
A bun who defeated a DOG.
You crawl into the lunchbox, battle-scarred but alive.
The crackers look at you with awe.
The apple shifts to make room.
Even the drained juice box seems impressed.
Legends will be told of you.
You are not just a survivor.
(You are the greatest bun who ever lived.)

game_over.name: Defeat
game_over.description: You fall. The darkness takes you. Some stories don't have happy endings.
endingText: You had purpose. You had hope.
But in the end, you were just a bun in a trash can.
Some stories don't have happy endings.
